nodes.text: Clingsilk was a material used to make clothing. The female Jenets who worked a private lounge in the Aquarium Room of the Pearl Island Casino wore clingsilk skirts along with backless blouses.

Author Troy Denning introduced clingsilk in his short story "The Trouble with Squibs," first published in Star Wars Insider 67 in May 2003. The story was later reprinted in October 2005 on the Hyperspace website.
